name: ORS Visit History for an Establishment
description: A summary count by year, month and visit status of the number of visits booked for a date range for a specific establishment. A detailed tab is also given listing Visit Date, Visit Status, Visit Start Time and the name and NOMS Number of each prisoner VIS0005 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 12/04/2016

dataset.name: Visits Booked
dataset.query: DP16_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'SYYYY')) AS YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE, 'MM')) AS MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.START_TIME AS START_TIME, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.END_TIME AS END_TIME, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END AS VISIT_TYPE_HELD, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE AS ALERT_CODE, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_DATE AS ALERT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.EXPIRY_DATE AS EXPIRY_DATE, DP16_.UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS CELL_LOCATION FROM DP16_, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (DP16_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY=AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, VISIT_DATE, YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, VISIT_TYPE_HELD, STATUS_OF_VISIT, ALERT_CODE, DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, CELL_LOCATION, CASE WHEN CELL_LOCATION IS NULL THEN 'OUT' ELSE CELL_LOCATION END AS V_CELL_LOCATION FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2)

dataset.name: Prisoner location
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2)

dataset.name: Grand total
dataset.query: SELECT SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) AS OFFICIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS SOCIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) + SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS OFFICIAL_AND_SOCIAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Official' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_OFFICIAL, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Social' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SOCIAL FROM ${tableId})

dataset.name: Year total
dataset.query: SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE AS YEAR, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) AS OFFICIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS SOCIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) + SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS OFFICIAL_AND_SOCIAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Official' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_OFFICIAL, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Social' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SOCIAL FROM ${tableId}) GROUP BY YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE

dataset.name: Section total
dataset.query: SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, ' ' AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) AS OFFICIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS SOCIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) + SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS OFFICIAL_AND_SOCIAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Official' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_OFFICIAL, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Social' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SOCIAL FROM ${tableId}) GROUP BY YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE

dataset.name: Section
dataset.query: SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) AS OFFICIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS SOCIAL_COUNT, SUM(IS_OFFICIAL) + SUM(IS_SOCIAL) AS OFFICIAL_AND_SOCIAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Official' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_OFFICIAL, CASE WHEN VISIT_TYPE_HELD = 'Social' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_SOCIAL FROM ${tableId}) GROUP BY YEAR_OF_VISIT_DATE, MONTH_OF_VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT

report.name: Detail By Visit Status and Date
